faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about JengaHacks 2026

whatIsJengahacks.question: What is JengaHacks?
whatIsJengahacks.answer: JengaHacks is East Africa's premier 36-hour hackathon event taking place in Nairobi, Kenya. It brings together developers, designers, and entrepreneurs to build innovative solutions across multiple tracks including FinTech, HealthTech, AgriTech, EdTech, Climate Tech, JobTech, AI/ML, and Open Innovation.

whenWhere.question: When and where is JengaHacks 2026?
whenWhere.answer: JengaHacks 2026 will take place on February 21-22, 2026 in Nairobi, Kenya at PromptBI's HQ. The event runs for 36 hours, starting at 9:00 AM on February 21st and ending at 9:00 PM on February 22nd.

whoCanParticipate.question: Who can participate?
whoCanParticipate.answer: JengaHacks is open to developers, designers, entrepreneurs, and students from across East Africa. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced professional, if you're passionate about building innovative solutions, you're welcome to join!

teamSize.question: What is the team size?
teamSize.answer: Teams can consist of 1-4 members. You can register as an individual and form a team at the event, or register with your team already formed. Team formation sessions will be held at the beginning of the hackathon.

whatToBring.question: What should I bring?
whatToBring.answer: Bring your laptop, charger, and any development tools you need. We'll provide food, drinks, Wi-Fi, workspace, and mentorship throughout the event. Optional items include a sleeping bag (if you plan to rest), headphones, and any hardware components for your project.

cost.question: How much does it cost to participate?
cost.answer: JengaHacks 2026 is completely free to participate! We provide meals, snacks, drinks, workspace, Wi-Fi, and all event materials at no cost. Just bring your passion and creativity!

prizes.question: What are the prizes?
prizes.answer: JengaHacks 2026 offers exciting prizes for top performers: Main Prizes: • 1st Place: KES 50,000 • 2nd Place: KES 25,000 • 3rd Place: KES 10,000 Special Awards: • Best Design • Most Innovative • Best Pitch All Participants Receive: • Mentorship opportunities with industry experts • Networking sessions with sponsors and fellow participants • Certificate of participation • Event swag bag with branded merchandise • Potential partnership opportunities with sponsors View full prizes details →

registrationDeadline.question: When is the registration deadline?
registrationDeadline.answer: Registration is open until we reach our capacity of 200 participants. We recommend registering early to secure your spot. If registration is full, you can join our waitlist and we'll notify you if a spot becomes available.

waitlist.question: What happens if I'm on the waitlist?
waitlist.answer: If you're on the waitlist, we'll notify you via email if a spot becomes available. Waitlist positions are filled on a first-come, first-served basis. Make sure to check your email regularly and respond promptly if you receive a spot.

moreQuestions.question: I have more questions. How can I get in touch?
moreQuestions.answer: You can reach out to us through our Discord community, email us at hello@siliconsavannahsolutions.com, or connect with us on social media. We're happy to help answer any questions you may have!
